brand.name: Trash Can Man
brand.tagline: On-site trash & recycling can cleaning for Doylestown’s most discerning homes.

hero.headline: Fresh, clean trash cans—without you lifting a finger.
hero.subtext: We come to your home and deep-clean your trash and recycling cans with a professional on-site system. No mess. No smell. Just clean bins curb to garage.

image.alt: Mobile trash can cleaning at a residential driveway

about.story_text: Trash Can Man was built for homeowners who want their property to feel clean from the front door to the curb. Trash and recycling cans collect grime, odors, and bacteria—especially in warm months. Our on-site cleaning system delivers a consistent, repeatable deep-clean right at your home, so you get fresh bins without the hassle.
about.founder_note: My goal is simple: show up on time, work neatly, and leave you with cans you’re not embarrassed to keep near your home. If it’s not spotless, it’s not finished.

features.title: On-Site Can Cleaning
features.description: We arrive at your home and clean your trash and recycling cans using a dedicated mobile system—no mess left behind.

features.title: Odor Control That Lasts
features.description: We target the source of smells—buildup and residue—so your bins stay noticeably fresher between pickups.

features.title: Sanitary Results
features.description: Regular cleaning helps reduce bacteria and grime that can attract pests and create lingering odors near your garage or side yard.

features.title: Curb-to-Garage Convenience
features.description: No scrubbing. No splashing. No chemicals in your driveway. You book—then enjoy cleaner bins.

features.title: Discreet, Respectful Service
features.description: We work neatly and efficiently, with a premium-home mindset—quiet, careful, and professional.

features.title: Perfect for Busy Households
features.description: Weekly or seasonal buildup? We keep your cans under control so your home feels clean all around.

processSteps.title: Request Service
processSteps.description: Send a quick message through the form and tell us how many trash and recycling cans you want cleaned.

processSteps.title: Confirm & Schedule
processSteps.description: We’ll confirm details and schedule a visit that fits your routine—simple, clear communication.

processSteps.title: On-Site Deep Clean
processSteps.description: We arrive with our system and thoroughly clean your cans at your home—controlled, neat, and efficient.

processSteps.title: Fresh Cans, Zero Hassle
processSteps.description: You’re left with noticeably cleaner, fresher bins—ready for curb day and comfortable near your home.

faqs.question: Do you come to my home to do the cleaning?
faqs.answer: Yes. We’re a mobile, on-site service. We clean your trash and recycling cans at your property using our dedicated system.

faqs.question: How long does a visit take?
faqs.answer: Most visits are quick and efficient. Timing depends on the number of cans, but we aim to be in and out with minimal disruption.

faqs.question: What kinds of cans do you clean?
faqs.answer: We clean standard residential trash and recycling cans, including wheeled carts commonly used for curb pickup.

faqs.question: Will this help with odors?
faqs.answer: Yes—odors typically come from residue and buildup. Our process targets the source so your bins stay noticeably fresher.

faqs.question: Do I need to be home?
faqs.answer: Not necessarily. As long as the cans are accessible and we’ve confirmed the details, we can complete the service without you being present.

faqs.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faqs.answer: Yes. We’re licensed and insured for your peace of mind.

service_area.travel_note: Outside these areas? Reach out—extended travel is available with a custom quote.

contact.headline: Request trash can cleaning
contact.subheadline: Tell us how many cans you have and where you’re located. We’ll reply to confirm details and schedule your on-site clean.
